member.name: T:PayPal.Permissions.Model.AckCode
member.summary: AckCodeType This code identifies the acknowledgment code types that could be used to communicate the status of processing a (request) message to an application. This code would be used as part of a response message that contains an application level acknowledgment element.

member.name: T:PayPal.Permissions.Model.GetBasicPersonalDataRequest
member.summary: Request to retrieve basic personal data.Accepts PersonalAttributeList as request and responds with PersonalDataList. This call will accept only 'Basic' attributes and ignore others.

member.name: T:PayPal.Permissions.Model.GetAdvancedPersonalDataRequest
member.summary: Request to retrieve personal data.Accepts PersonalAttributeList as request and responds with PersonalDataList. This call will accept both 'Basic' and Advanced attributes.
